weaponBlueprint.name: GB_AC_4
weaponBlueprint.title: Autocannon Mark IV
weaponBlueprint.desc: A super heavy Autocannon that only ever was in limited production before the end of the war before being cancelled. Scarcely seen in the modern Universe.
weaponBlueprint.tooltip: 1 shot 4 damage weapon, 85% chance to not use ammo, 40% chance to cause a breach, 40% chance to stun
